A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
An incoherent mess of bad pacing\,  expository writing\, forced jokes\, one liners and beyond obvious sociopolitical messages. 

It also destroys most of which TFA build towards to in the most anti-climatic ways and ignores defining character archs build in the previous trilogies. 

This just may be the worst Star Wars film to date and makes me doubt the quality of the future Star Wars films to come. 

I wish i didn't spend over 20 bucks for a ticket to see this. Rian Johnson should be removed from Star Wars since it is obvious he doesn't understand what makes it special.
